languages.text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer`s Combat Tactics areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} doesn`t stack.

All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's Combat Tactics areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's Combat Tactics areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

languages.text: 当装备者使用新的{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战斗策略{/g}时，装备者{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域的所有加成效果都会提高5%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用新的{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战斗策略{/g}时，装备者战斗策略区域的所有加成效果都会提高5%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}不可叠加。
当装备者使用新的{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战斗策略{/g}时，装备者战斗策略区域的所有加成效果都会提高5%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}不可叠加。

languages.text: 使用者が以前に使用したものと異なる{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}策略{/g}を使用した場合、または以前に使用したものがない場合、使用者の軍略エリアからの全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間+5%増加する。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's Combat Tactics areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が以前に使用したものと異なる{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}策略{/g}を使用した場合、または以前に使用したものがない場合、着用者の戦闘戦術領域からの全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に限り5％増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}はスタックしない。

着用者が以前に使用したものと異なる{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}策略{/g}を使用した場合、または以前に使用したものがない場合、着用者の戦闘戦術領域からの全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に限り5％増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}はスタックしない。

languages.text: Todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de las zonas de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g} aumentan un +5 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} si el portador usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} distinta a la anterior o si no se había usado una anteriormente. Este efecto no se acumula.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de las zonas de Tácticas de combate aumentan un +5 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} si el portador usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} distinta a la anterior o si no se había usado una anteriormente. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} no se acumula.

languages.text: Sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} der {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Bereiche des Trägers werden 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +5 % erhöht, wenn der Träger ein {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategem{/g} nutzt, das sich von dem zuvor genutzten unterscheidet, oder wenn davor kein anderes genutzt wurde. Dieser Effekt ist nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} der Kampftaktik-Bereiche des Trägers werden 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +5 % erhöht, wenn der Träger ein {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Stratagem{/g} nutzt, das sich von dem zuvor genutzten unterscheidet, oder wenn davor kein anderes genutzt wurde. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} addiert sich nicht.

languages.text: Все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} от зон {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g} увеличиваются на 5% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, если персонаж использует {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагему{/g}, отличную от предыдущей, или если перед этим стратагемы не использовались. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} от зон {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g} увеличиваются на 5% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, если персонаж использует {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагему{/g}, отличную от предыдущей, или если перед этим стратагемы не использовались. Эффект не суммируется.

Все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} от зон Стратегического плана увеличиваются на 5% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, если персонаж использует {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагему{/g}, отличную от предыдущей, или если перед этим стратагемы не использовались. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conférés par les zones de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent de +5 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} si l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Stratagème{/g} différent de celui utilisé précédemment, ou si aucun n'a encore été utilisé. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conférés par les zones de Tactiques de Combat de l'utilisateur augmentent de +5 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} si l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Stratagème{/g} différent de celui utilisé précédemment, ou si aucun n'a encore été utilisé. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} n'est pas cumulable.

languages.text: Takan kişi, daha önce kullanılandan farklı (veya daha önce hiç kullanılmamışsa) bir {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullanırsa {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanlarının sağladığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g}, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} +%5 artar. Bu etki, üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.
